snippet.title: Iridion 2 (GBA) Longplay / Walkthrough (4K)
snippet.description:
A longplay of Iridion II on the Nintendo Game Boy Advance (GBA), an excellent shoot 'em up game, uploaded in 4K! This is easily one of my favorite games on the system. Awesome gameplay, great visuals, and some of the best music on the Gameboy Advance, period. You also might notice the extremely innovative dynamic intro music on the start screen. I've never found a feature like this before and I REALLY dig it. Made by Shin'en, who you also might recognize as the devs for "The Tourist" and some other interesting games, including the first Iridion 3D. Like, share and sub for more longplays and other gaming content! Enjoy! :)

Check out my merch link! It's a huge help!
https://bit.ly/LPLstore
